mapper.select: SELECT id, name, email, role FROM users WHERE deleted = false ORDER BY id
SELECT id, name, password, email, role, deleted FROM users WHERE email = #{email} AND deleted = false
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (name, password, email, role, deleted) VALUES (#{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{role}, FALSE)
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, role = #{role}, deleted = #{deleted} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET deleted = true WHERE id = #{id}
